  • Method Details

    • addCourse

      void addCourse(int id, String name, int instId, int courseFee) throws CourseExistsAlreadyException
      Method: addCourse Description: Adds a new course to the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the course.
      name - The name of the course.
      instId - The ID of the instructor.
      courseFee - The fee of the course.
      Throws:
      CourseExistsAlreadyException - If the course already exists.

    • deleteCourse

      void deleteCourse(int id) throws CourseNotFoundException
      Method: deleteCourse Description: Deletes a course from the system.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the course to be deleted.
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - If the course does not exist.

    • showCourses

      ArrayList<Course> showCourses()
      Method: showCourses Description: Retrieves all available courses.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all available courses.

    • closeRegistration

      void closeRegistration(int id)
      Method: closeRegistration Description: Closes registration for a course.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the course for which registration is to be closed.

    • assignCourse

      void assignCourse(int courseId, int instructorId)
      Method: assignCourse Description: Assigns a course to an instructor.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course.
      instructorId - The ID of the instructor.

    • registerStudent

      void registerStudent(int id, String name, String phone, String email, String password, String branch, String batch)
      Method: registerStudent Description: Registers a new student.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the student.
      name - The name of the student.
      phone - The phone number of the student.
      email - The email of the student.
      password - The password of the student.
      branch - The branch of the student.
      batch - The batch of the student.

    • registerProfessor

      void registerProfessor(int id, String name, String phone, String email, String password, String department, String designation)
      Method: registerProfessor Description: Registers a new professor.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the professor.
      name - The name of the professor.
      phone - The phone number of the professor.
      email - The email of the professor.
      password - The password of the professor.
      department - The department of the professor.
      designation - The designation of the professor.

    • verifyCredentials

      String verifyCredentials(int id, String password) throws AuthenticationException
      Method: verifyCredentials Description: Verifies login credentials.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      The role of the user if authentication is successful.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If authentication fails.

    • approveStudent

      void approveStudent(int studentId)
      Method: approveStudent Description: Approves a student registration.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to be approved.

      Method: viewProfessors Description: Retrieves all registered professors.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all registered professors.

      void approveCourse(int courseId, int studentId)
      Method: approveCourse Description: Approves a course registration for a student.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to be approved.
      studentId - The ID of the student for whom the course is to be approved.
